Text: FarewellJeff Today is my last official day at Enron It has truly been a great professional experience working at Enron Particularly memorable has been the opportunity to work with some of the most talented people ever gathered in one organization Should a need arise in the future where my skills and experience can make a difference please do not hesitate to contact me With Best Regards Don Reid Phanturn Lane Bellaire TX email Homefax Mobile

ContratulationsJeff Congratulations on your new position and responsibilities I very much look forward to continuting to contribute as much as possible to the accomplishment of Enrons goals values and bottomline Best Regards Don Reid
